* The Bourne Identity (2002) - A gritty and suspenseful thriller about a man who wakes up with amnesia and must figure out who he is and why people are trying to kill him.

Both of these movies offer a mix of exciting action sequences, intricate plotting, and compelling characters that fans of "Die Hard" are likely to enjoy!
